reqs: Topic: Island Southeast Asia. A survey of music in the archipelagos of Southeast Asia (mainly Indonesia) seen through the lens of their societies histories and ways of life, all preceded by a brief general introduction to music and human evolution.
courseName: World Music Cultures - ISLAND SE ASIA
description: Introduction to the principles of ethnomusicology and an examination of at least two contrasting musical traditions. May be repeated once for credit if different traditions are covered.
